'sdcLog' is work in progress and aims to provide tools which simplify
statistical disclosure control in the context of research data centers.

Please note that the 'sdcLog' project is released with a
[Contributor Code of Conduct](https://github.com/matthiasgomolka/sdcLog/blob/main/.github/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
